alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Eau Claire; Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 10:53PM CDT until May 12 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rusk County in northwestern Wisconsin... Chippewa County in west central Wisconsin... Eastern Eau Claire County in west central Wisconsin... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1053 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Exeland to 5 miles south of Fall Creek, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Augusta around 1110 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern and west central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern and west central Wisconsin.
